title: Fixed Value Schema
description: A representation of a Fixed Value

displayOrder.description: The order in which this value should display in context of other fixed values

displayValue.description: The value of the fixed value as seen in UIs

fixedValueId.description: The unique ID of the fixed value

metadataDefinitionId.description: The ID of the metadataDefinition this fixed value is associated with

systemValue.description: The value of the fixed Value as seen by NWEA systems
